A decrease in expenditure on health and an increase in deregulation of the labour market

question:

options: A positive externality and a reduction in social costs
A negative externality and an increase in social costs
A positive externality and a reduction in social benefits
A negative externality and an increase in social benefits

AD curve shifts to the right.
